website_summaries.verdict: Striking clock face and craftsmanship in a design that looks simple, but is chock-full of diver-friendly features.
pros: Features LumiBrite hands and hour markers for improved visibility in low-light conditions and night dives
Made from stainless steep and secures with a fold-over clasp
Waters-resistant to 200 meters, and comes with a 3-year manufacturer's warranty
cons: Expensive option for a dive watch
Orange clock face seems to be hit or miss with consumers, especially since it's not available in other colors

customer_reviews.title: updated review. my fault with first bad review.
customer_reviews.text: i dissed this watch because it did not keep time right out of the box. i thought it was a bad battery...but it has an automatic self-wind movement to power it up. and i returned them. my ignorance. i have now viewed about two hours of youtube seiko and citizen watch reviews and have ordered a seiko padi sne499 solar dive watch. might get a citizen also. thanks for the comments to my bad review.... that brought me up to speed for my error. to seiko: my apologies.
customer_reviews.author: b. payne

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for <$300
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Can’t describe how great the orange is. Has to be seen. I added the orange NATO strap to really set it off. Second hand sweep is very smooth. The luminous hands are very bright in the dark. It’s a large watch, not going to lie, but if you have the arm/wrist for it then the watch has great presence. I have a collection of Tag Heuer watches at each cost >$1,000, and this is now steady in rotation. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F.

customer_reviews.title: Great TRUE divers watch.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent authentic divers watch. You can truly bring this watch to full recreational diving depth (and beyond) and it will keep working perfectly. Wears small, which is great as this watch is nearly 44mm. Love it! Love that it isn’t copying Rolex. It’s a true seiko design and iconic in its own right. I’ve attached a photo of when the hands are in the “rocket ship” position.
customer_reviews.author: theoriginalsubguy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch! The movement does pretty good job keeping time. The reason I can’t give 5 stars is the details, hour markers that do not align properly with the markers on the chapter ring. Same issue with the vessel, doesn’t seem to align perfectly at 12 o’clock. An entry level swiss watch beats this Seiko on that matter. The seller Outdoor Sports Equipment provided good service and delivery. Update: Not all stainless steel is made equal and, with that said, the steel of this watch seems cheap, scratches easily, and the aluminum insert on bezel is easily damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and Eyecatcher
customer_reviews.text: The shipping and handling was flawless. I could constantly track the parcel and the watch came safely packed. You will often read about a misaligned bezel, chapter ring, indicators. Mine as well does not line up 100% perfectly, but only visibly at 8 o'clock. At 12 and 6 o'clock all good at least to my eyes. I put it right away on a le mans NATO strap=truly nice look. Keeps time really well within specs and much better than another 4r36 I have. The watch was immediately liked by my son and now it's no longer mine... sigh
customer_reviews.author: H. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Solid diver, great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased about a month ago, no regrets. Wears a bit smaller than the specs suggest, which is good (I have a 6.75" wrist). My only (minor) complaint is that the contrast between the orange dial and the indices isn't as sharp, making it a little more difficult to read at a glance. Otherwise an excellent diver, excellent value. Solid, masculine bracelet, knurled bezel and crown, drilled lugs, hacking, hand winding - hard to beat for the price I paid. Zero problems with alignments on mine. More accurate than I'd expected. Definitely would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic watch. I love everything about this watch
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic watch. I love everything about this watch. The orange color is great, the date function is perfect, and the 41 hour reserve is more than enough for me
customer_reviews.author: kyle c.

customer_reviews.title: Bad idea to buy watches online
customer_reviews.text: Bad workmanship, the key markers, 12,3,6,9 are not aligned. The face of watch is tilted to the left.
customer_reviews.author: kc.leong

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch. I also purchased the Seiko Rubber Watch Band also (Pictured). Keeps time to the second.
customer_reviews.author: KG1

customer_reviews.title: Rip skx.....don't pay samurai money for skx
customer_reviews.text: This watch has rekindled my love of seiko watches. I had bought a sapphire crystal seiko quartz and I felt the quality was more like wenger / timex and not seiko. I don't understand how anyone can buy a rattly skx with the lesser mechanism and dial detail and the same or more price point. This samurai feels solid, setting the time feels substantial, the bezel is solid, the orange is much nicer in reality than pictures show, and the time reserve is great. The steel also resists scratches and gauges well and has a more upscale polish. In this price range there is no better substitute.
customer_reviews.author: F. X.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, it seems like it keeps going up in price, I'm glad I picked it up below the $300 mark. It's everything you'd come to expect from a Seiko watch.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Orange Diver
customer_reviews.text: Seiko divers have a very special orange dial, it is very sublte and does not pop in your face. This is a great looking timepiece. The lug lengh makes it very wearable even with the 44mm size. Very unique design, it will not look like any other watch. The case design grew on me and at times I found it to be more confortable then the Seiko turtle design. Fantastic lume as expected with a Seiko. 200m water resistance makes it a no worry watch to wear just about any occasion except formal. My alignment was good, but check to make sure.
customer_reviews.author: CFI2

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Next to my Omega, this is my favorite watch and is my daily go to. Its big, its heavy, and its easy to read. For the money, this watch cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Poole

customer_reviews.title: Orange diver 😎 !
customer_reviews.text: I have several seiko three of which are samurais , I enjoy the large easy to read face and the monster hands. This larger Watch wears smaller than its size due to the design of the case and short lugs . I owned a Breitling super ocean in coral which was of course Orange . I gave that to my son and have missed having a orange faced diver now I have one . Everything lines up perfect and super hast shipping love it !
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value and stunning dial
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is new to the watch hobby, I struggled for months looking for something that wowed me. I decided to go all out for something flashy, and I was fascinated by orange dial. I'm glad that I ultimately decided on this Seiko, because it's even better looking in person. For this price, this watch is wonderfully made. You can't go wrong with Seiko, and this one is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Big and bright
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and on time. Lovely heavy watch, nice bright face and wears really well on a 71⁄4" wrist with a few links removed. Links easily removed by yourself, just watch for the small shim falling out of the centre bit on the link when you split it. Seems to be losing 3 secs per day but that's nothing, my Hamiltons and Omegas don't perform much better. Really happy with it and have now bought another 2 Samurais because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Skunge

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch but I am not a fan of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch but I am not a fan of the bracelet due to its push-pin links. The quality of the bracelet is good enough but the push pin assembly makes it very difficult to adjust to your fit. I took it off and replaced it with a Navy Blue Nato strap and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alignment and crown spacing
customer_reviews.text: The first samurai I received had an issue with the bezel click spring. It would spin both ways. Amazon sent me another. This one is perfect- perfect alignment and the crown is centered in the guards. This is the best samurai color way. Real happy with this on. I have it on a Seiko black rubber strap from a turtle. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Stemmy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch, no alignment issues. Arrived fast and a great price. Felt the need to update, bought in July so nine months now. Still enjoy, nice color change to change out to every now and then. REALLY stands out from the rest of my watches but not in a bad way. It gets worn way more than I ever thought it would. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Seiko
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch , II own several Tag watches , Breitling , Movado an several others this is my go to watch for everyday. Saw it at Macy’s but didn’t want to pay their price bought it on Amazon for almost half the price. Will definitely check out other Seiko watches
customer_reviews.author: walter barnes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent weight. Bracelet is made in China
customer_reviews.text: Excellent weight. Bracelet is made in China, but fear not: it is beautiful, solid, and worthy of a much higher price. The orange dial and luminosity of the hands and hour markers are amazing. This is absolutely the BEST automatic 200m diver's you can buy for under five hundred bucks. BRAVO, Seiko!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emsh

customer_reviews.title: Good and different diver
customer_reviews.text: Like the other versions of the seiko "samurai" this one have a good quality for the price you pay. Good movement, with hacking and handwinding, decent precision and a solid case but confortable, the desing of the watch is modern and different, this watch have its own personality. The dial is more simple than the other samurais because is plain but the orange colour is really cool, I have the padi samurai and the pepsi and this orange is my favourite one. If you want a good real diver watch with a good quality/price ratio, with a strong wrist presence and a amazing colour this is your watch.
customer_reviews.author: Cierzo España

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Wears good. Easy to read. Accurate. Affordable. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: John Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Love the samurai! -7 seconds a day
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! My only gripe is it’s minus 7 seconds per day, I like my watches running slightly fast not slow but a minor complaint. Very happy with my purchase though, I did get a strapcode Hexad for it. Bezel has a very good feel both the clicks and knurling.
customer_reviews.author: 05 Raven

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is like my 20th watch from Amazon since 2017. The packaging has gotten from bad to worse, now with zero protection . Watch is a dream, solidly built ( otherwise it wouldnt have survived the journey !) , Outstanding Value for money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Time Keeper.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this watch. Build quality, perfect size, comfort are excellent. However the movement 4R35 in the watch is horrible. It runs 33 seconds slow which is just 2 seconds within Seiko's acceptable range. Cannot return for adjustment. My Seiko Turtle runs +5 seconds per day. I'm thinking Ebay.
customer_reviews.author: CeeBee.

customer_reviews.title: The orange dial is a lighter orange and looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Classic diver with an orange twist doesn’t make it as dull as the standard black or navy dial diver watch. I have received several compliments in just one week. Not too heavy or bold and seems to be accurate as well. Solid watch.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Blake Howell

customer_reviews.title: Inferior to cheaper watch
customer_reviews.text: Cannot read the date. The Invicta is much better, magnifying bubble over date, and only $100 vs $303 for the Seiko. If I hadn't waited too long, I'd have returned it!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmythecop

customer_reviews.title: Seiko...hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, very good lumenocity... 44mm so fits well... I've had a few Seiko dive watches over the years, never a failure... Got a very good price on it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pics don't do it justice
customer_reviews.text: My first Samuri and I love it! Tight bezel, high quality bracelet with a killer movement. The face is a classic 70's flat orange.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Nidek

customer_reviews.title: No Disappointment Here
customer_reviews.text: This has quickly become my favorite watch and I have two Tag Heuers that I love to wear. Unlike other reviews, my bezel lines up perfectly all the way around, snaps cleanly, and keeps time well within specs.
customer_reviews.author: William Joseph Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch. I have been wearing it day and night and it feels great and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Seiko reigns.
customer_reviews.text: Hefty feel, very manly, very eye catching, quite accurate and received complements on my first wear. No regrets
customer_reviews.author: watchfreak

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Return the watch since I prefer the padi one. Definitely a handsome looking watch. I will keep both if I can. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Good value but not blown away
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice watch. Drawbacks are general thickness of case/bezel makes a pretty heavy, beefy watch. Secondly lack of refined machining in the screw down crown, you get a metal on metal feel when screwing it in/out that reminds you that you saved money.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Redhouse

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The orange really pops, this is one of the watches in my weekly rotation, fit and finish is perfect. +3 secs/day so far.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have several solar Seiko and this is the first of self wind automatic watch. Feels little heavy, but excellent watch. Radium is very good quality so that you can see time clearly in the night. This is my favorite watch now.
customer_reviews.author: Rema Sundaravel

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Bargain Dive Watch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutley love the Samurai - orange dial really makes it pop too. Very legible , big dial dive watch easy to read and great waterproof perfection. Love it - Bargain price too - easily looks and feels like a $1000 watch
customer_reviews.author: grumpy yorkshire git

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very good bang for your buck. The build quality is on par with watches well above this price range. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. Wise Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice diver for price point
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with watch- great appearance and feel- seems to keep perfect time
customer_reviews.author: norm schaller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the unique orange dial but is too big for my hand. Anyway is my desire colour.
customer_reviews.author: Lorriane Chue

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves the color, look,and features of this watch. If it is not for every day you will need to reset the time as it will not stay current if it is Idol....very accurate when wearing daily.
customer_reviews.author: Netty

customer_reviews.title: Accurate time keeping
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch but if you let it sit on a counter or dresser it loses 2 to 3 minutes in about 12 hours and the power reserve is about half of what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dreifke

customer_reviews.title: My Daily Driver
customer_reviews.text: Love my Samurai! It's an Automatic so not very accurate but who cares!
customer_reviews.author: Cherokee59

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well constructed watch. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch with one drawback
customer_reviews.text: Great watch really stands out. Good price as well. I was worried about Seiko QA but I am happy to report there are No problems with bezel alignment or date alignment. Accuracy is very good. Bracelet is just ok and that cheap clasp is just horrible. I will have to check for alternative bracelets and that will add up on the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Rotem Lezter

customer_reviews.title: It’s a SEIKO!
customer_reviews.text: Eye catching orange face that earned a compliment within the first hour I had it on.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas M. Gay

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic watch (orange on orange)
customer_reviews.text: Despite the pictures, I received an orange on orange version (nice!). The build quality is excellent, everything feels 'tight' and it wears very well. It looks so nice without being gaudy even with it being orange. I'm super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Not an authentic seiko watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch work for a week, after that it start getting behind with the time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Campoverde

customer_reviews.title: Good product for its price and appearance
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, automatic really means move it daily or every two days, so keep wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Romano

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great Looking Watch! Solid Build. My New Favorite in Collection!
customer_reviews.author: neal sako

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch, not as heavy as you'd think and pretty accurate. Mine has gained a couple seconds in the last week. My wrist are a little bigger then average and I had to take the micro adjustment as
customer_reviews.author: T. Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Seiko diver
customer_reviews.text: My first orange dial Seiko, saw it on offer and couldn't resist, beautiful looking watch. This is a proper dive/tool watch, ISO certified, couldn't be happier. Chapter ring/bezel perfect alignment, been wearing it for a few days now and running around +2 second p/d which is outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Anita Spanky

customer_reviews.title: Good for christmas gift :)
customer_reviews.text: Much much better than what I expected. Diver's measurement also turns very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Maik0

customer_reviews.title: Straight Quality. Period.
customer_reviews.text: This watch has Quality written all over it..A divers watch..love the crown..my freinds love it..some are going to purchase the Samurai
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Seeking Prospex - Orange
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch - the orange is just the right tone but having seen the review saying how bright the luminous hands are I was a little underwhelmed by the faint glow in the dark. That aside happy with supplier and the watch
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the watch, but only wears it on weekends. I didn't realize you have to be wearing it and moving to keep it wound
customer_reviews.author: Christine Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Classic Seiko
customer_reviews.text: Reminiscent of the watch that rode my wrist around the world in the 70s and 80s. That watch was bulletproof. This one is looking to ride my wrist for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Soyars

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not what we expected.
customer_reviews.text: The watch was nice, but not the color that my husband expected. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is perfect except the bezel easily fixed se 2nd pic!!!
customer_reviews.author: ed sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Good looking watch. Even better when paired with "Watch Band with Colorful Nylon Material Strap and Heavy Duty Brushed Buckle". Nice size and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Rodriguez Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Pricing
customer_reviews.text: Just recently started collecting high end time pieces..and this one surely fits and feels high end.
customer_reviews.author: George Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love wearing this watch. But it is on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: Emil S.

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted watch that looks great
customer_reviews.text: Watch is great. Very high quality piece and I have gotten many compliments since purchasing it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Lee

customer_reviews.title: Orange Samurai FTW
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my eye on the Orange Samurai for some time. It came as promised. The watch itself keeps good time for an automatic. (Gains 5 seconds a day) and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice watch
customer_reviews.text: For the price is everything I was expecting, nothing more nothing else, just another good watch from Seiko, they can really make orange dials.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: cannot adjust day/date with stem as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is Seiko you idiots. I have been wearing these watches since my first one in 1965, Vietnam and they have NEVER let me down, BUT this one has. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. The lume is VERY bright and long lasting, the paint application is beautiful and waterproof is great ( I swim with it all the time)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but it's only been 3 days, time will tell! 😂
customer_reviews.author: chuckremodel

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch and my first seiko diver. Took one star off due to the pin and collar system on the bracelet, it’s not easy to adjust and a local jeweler charged me $50 to make the adjustment. Amazon did credit me $50 for the labor so thanks amazon! The watch itself is very nice and crown is a bit stiff but whatever. I did write to seiko asking for additional pin/collars because they are specific to each watch.
customer_reviews.author: ttturbo4

customer_reviews.title: really fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipment and delivery to the Netherlands. Very nice watch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice! What else can you say? Actually a decent bracelet also
customer_reviews.author: Greg S. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: I’m an Orange Monster fan. Get this watch.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it but Seiko always makes great watches. It looks great .
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Seiko Samurai
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Ordered it new and I love the look and feel of this watch. Highly recommended. This watch came extremely fast.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Due

customer_reviews.title: Great automatic watch
customer_reviews.text: First automatic watch in my collection, absolutely love it. Great quality for price, and an awesome eye-catching unique design.
customer_reviews.author: Eilon

customer_reviews.title: brush and polish combination on the bracelet is a nice
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is beyond its price, brush and polish combination on the bracelet is a nice touch
customer_reviews.author: otty

customer_reviews.title: Just a great watch.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with every aspect of this great Seiko Orange Samurai.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch , came fast and exactly what was promised.
customer_reviews.author: BigIslandStyle

customer_reviews.title: Seiko Samurai
customer_reviews.text: Nice massive watch, extremely good readability in the dark. runs only ten seconds after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Josef B

customer_reviews.title: Another nice seiko
customer_reviews.text: The orange pops and loom is very bright at night after a day of wear
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch.....
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and is a heavy watch. Built well. I thoroughly enjoy this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Stoll

customer_reviews.title: feels like quality
customer_reviews.text: i love the watch . the bezel looks cheap. not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Does what you’d want of a diver for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Eric Carter

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself to a orange 😊
customer_reviews.text: Seiko Orange nothing like it monster hands. lumed to the max ..samurai excellence. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Irish lad.

customer_reviews.title: The product is what it say it was - perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like when they opened my package when it arrive in Malaysia.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hana

customer_reviews.title: Great Seiko Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous watch! Extremely pleased with this purchase. I have been wearing it for 4 days and it is running a minute fast. Reset it today and will check it again in a few days. Definitely not a complaint, just an observation. The weight feels just right on the wrist. Not too bulky, not too light. Compared to my Citizen Eco Drive it is very similar in feel. Looks good and is easy to read. The bezel is very high quality, turns with precision. I highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Austin

customer_reviews.title: This watch is a hot pumpkin FIRE! (It’s good)
customer_reviews.text: I love the dial color and the case shape of this watch. The value for money you get with Seiko is outstanding. The case, dial, bezel and crown are all high quality. The bezel is easy to operate as is the screw-down crown. The bracelet it just ok and is easy to replace because of the drilled-through lug ends. I replaced my bracelet with an orange and black BluShark 22mm NATO strap.
customer_reviews.author: chikinhammr

customer_reviews.title: A very solid watch that looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight, look, and quality of construction. The movement seems to be accurate and dependable. I appreciate that I won't have to open it up to replace a battery, ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D. Foss

feature_bullets: Men's Prospex Orange Samurai Divers Watch
One Way Rotating Elapsed Timing Bezel
Diver’s 200m (660ft) watch: in general, suitable for high-impact water sports and scuba diving at depths not requiring mixed-gas
